mapper.select: select id,fromId,toId,content,`state` from tb_history where (fromId = #{toUserId} and toId = #{userId}) or (fromId = #{userId} and toId = #{toUserId})

select h1.content as content,h1.fromId as fromId,u.username as fromUsername,t2.count as count from tb_history h1 left join sys_user u on h1.fromId = u.id right join ( select max(h2.id) as max_id,count(1) as count from tb_history h2 where h2.toId = #{userId} and h2.state = 0 group by h2.fromId ) t2 on h1.id = t2.max_id
